content: देशः [दिश्-अच्] {@--1@} A place or spot in general; देशः को नुजलावसेक शिथिलः <ls>Mk. 3. 12</ls>; (often used after words like कपोल, स्कंध, अंस, नितंब &c., without any meaning; स्कंधदेशे <ls>Ś. 1. 19</ls> ‘on the shoulder’). {@--2@} A region, country, province, land, territory; यं देशं श्रयते तमेव कुरुते बाहुप्रतापार्जितं <ls>H. 1. 171.</ls> {@--3@} A department, part, side, portion (as of a whole); as in एकदेश, एकदेशीय <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--4@} An institute, an ordinance. {@--5@} Range, compass; दृष्टिदेशः <ls>Pt. 2.</ls>
